collection.name: Озма
collection.openText: Дитя... Я дам тебе новую жизнь.

observe.desc:
[ {‘Gather around, everyone. Dance with me!’ A scarecrow with hay for brains, an emotionless woodsman of tin, and a lion without courage all soon gathered around her.
‘Friends! Let us proceed! Let's all go home together!’ Together, on their way home, they all obtained what they wished for
‘Let's all go together. A road long and harsh.’ And so, their endless march began.
Let's all march onward. To a beautiful land, to a world of dreams.} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: When an employee with less than 4 Fortitude committed work on $0, the Qliphoth Counter decreased. 용기가 4등급 이상인 직원이 $0의 작업을 진행하자 클리포트 카운터가 감소하였다.
When Instinct word was done, the Qliphoth Counter decreased.본능 작업을 완료하자 클리포트 카운터가 감소하였다.
If an Agent completes work while the Qliphoth Counter is 0, said employee is killed. Then, the Abnoramality will escape.클리포트 카운터가 0인 상태에서 $0의 작업을 완료한 직원은 사망한다. 이후 해당 환상체는 탈출하였다.
When $0 escaped, a House fell somewhere within the facility. $0이 탈출하자 시설 어딘가에 집이 떨어졌다.
$0 called for F-05-32 and F-01-87 within the Facility, and started a march together. 탈출한 $0은 시설 내의 F-05-32와 F-01-87을 불러내어 함께 행진을 시작했다.
